Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.compomics.util.gui.parameters.IdentificationParametersSelectionDialog
    no longer used
    com.compomics.util.experiment.biology.mutations.Mutation
    replaced by com.compomics.util.experiment.biology.variants.AminoAcidSubstitution instead
    com.compomics.util.experiment.biology.mutations.MutationMatrix
    replaced by com.compomics.util.experiment.biology.variants.AaSubstitutionMatrix
    com.compomics.util.preferences.PSProcessingPreferences
    replaced by utilities processing preferences and fraction preferences
    com.compomics.util.gui.genes.SpeciesDialog
    use the GenePreferencesDialog instead
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.compomics.util.preferences.GenePreferences.GENE_MAPPING_FILE_SUFFIX
    use the gene factory.
    com.compomics.util.preferences.GenePreferences.GO_MAPPING_FILE_SUFFIX
    use the gene factory.
    com.compomics.util.experiment.biology.AminoAcid.monoisotopicMass
    use the atomchain
    com.compomics.util.experiment.biology.Ion.theoreticMass
    use the double value instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.compomics.software.CompomicsWrapper.checkForNewVersion(String, String, String)
    use the Maven repository option instead: checkForNewDeployedVersion
    com.compomics.software.CompomicsWrapper.checkForNewVersion(String, String, String, boolean, String, String)
    use the Maven repository option instead: checkForNewDeployedVersion
    com.compomics.util.gui.spectrum.SpectrumPanel.determineColorOfPeak(String)
    it is advised to use methods based on the ion type rather than on the peak label
    com.compomics.util.gui.spectrum.SpectrumPanel.determineFragmentIonColor(String)
    use the method based on the Ion class instead
    com.compomics.util.gui.spectrum.SpectrumPanel.filterAnnotations(Vector<SpectrumAnnotation>, HashMap<Ion.IonType, ArrayList<Integer>>, ArrayList<NeutralLoss>, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    don't use method based on the peak labels but on the data type
    com.compomics.util.preferences.UtilitiesUserPreferences.generateProteinTree()
    no longer used
    com.compomics.util.experiment.identification.Advocate.getAdvocateFromFile(String)
    no longer used
    com.compomics.util.pride.PtmToPrideMap.getDefaultCVTerm(String)
    use the getCvTerm method for the PTM instead
    com.compomics.util.experiment.identification.identification_parameters.SearchParameters.getEnzyme()
    use the PTM Digestion preferences instead.
    com.compomics.util.experiment.identification.identification_parameters.SearchParameters.getnMissedCleavages()
    use the Digestion preferences instead.
    com.compomics.util.experiment.identification.identification_parameters.tool_specific.CometParameters.getUseSparseMatrix()
    from Comet release 2015.02 all searches use this internal data representation by default
    com.compomics.util.experiment.identification.spectrum_annotation.AnnotationSettings.isHighResolutionAnnotation()
    use tiesResolution instead
    com.compomics.util.experiment.biology.Enzyme.isSemiSpecific()
    use the digestion preferences instead
    com.compomics.util.experiment.biology.Enzyme.isUnspecific()
    use the digestion preferences instead
    com.compomics.util.experiment.biology.Enzyme.isWholeProtein()
    use the digestion preferences instead
    com.compomics.util.pride.PtmToPrideMap.loadPtmToPrideMap(SearchParameters)
    the CV term is now part of the PTM object
    com.compomics.util.preferences.UtilitiesUserPreferences.setGenerateProteinTree(Boolean)
    no longer used
    com.compomics.util.experiment.identification.spectrum_annotation.AnnotationSettings.setHighResolutionAnnotation(boolean)
    use tiesResolution instead
    com.compomics.util.experiment.identification.identification_parameters.tool_specific.CometParameters.setUseSparseMatrix(Boolean)
    from Comet release 2015.02 all searches use this internal data representation by default
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.compomics.util.gui.waiting.waitinghandlers.ProgressDialog(JFrame, String, String)
    use ProgressDialogX instead
    com.compomics.util.gui.spectrum.SequenceFragmentationPanel(String, ArrayList<IonMatch>, boolean, boolean, PtmSettings)
    use the panel with ion selection instead
